FuneInteraction1: ^Hiiiiii-yaaahhh! You young one, you come to challenge master Funé?
^What’s with that scar on your face…

c-0: ^And I’m prepared to use it! En garde!
^Haha, we have a feisty one here!
c-1: ^Oh, apologies, I get carried away sometimes, especially when I’m in the midst of practicing my katas.
c-2: ^With a scar like that, seems like someone else has already challenged you enough.
^Seems like ol’ Funé should teach you some manners.

Dovetail: ^Alright, well we’ll hold off on our challenge for now. You aren’t ready to face the mighty Funé anyhow. But if not to challenge me, what does bring you here little mouseling?
^Nezumi, huh? And why would Nezumi be sending a wee little mouse to see an accomplished Sensei like myself?
^He said something about it being dangerous. He said he knew my grandpa. He recognized my sword.
^Hmmm…I see. Your name wouldn’t be Darwin would it?
^Yes, sir. Why does everyone seem to know me here?
^Mmmm..well then I guess that ol’ geezer hasn’t lost his crackers yet.

^Nezumi was right. You see, possums have been terrorizing Totten Town as of late. Unless you can learn to slay them you won’t be seeing your family anytime soon. I think it’s time you put that sword of yours to good use, what do you say?

c-1: ^Yyy…you www…want mmmm…me to ffff..fight possums? IIII..dunno…
^Nonsense, every young grasshopper has got to start somewhere.
c-2: ^Then why don’t you take care of those possums yourself?
^Ahh, young grasshopper, still much to learn in the art of respecting your Sensei I see.

Dovetail2: ^Let’s get your training started then shall we. Head into the Unbridled Wood and slay ten possum minions. Once you have, return to me.
